trans-unit.source: Help us learn more about your store so we can offer you optimal guidance and the best features for your business!
trans-unit.target: Help us learn more about your store so we can offer you optimal guidance and the best features for your business!

trans-unit.source: This email address will be your username to access your store's back office.
trans-unit.target: This email address will be your username to access your store's back office.

trans-unit.source: Enter a password between %d and %d characters
trans-unit.target: Enter a password between %d and %d characters

trans-unit.source: Demo products are a good way to learn how to use PrestaShop. You should install them if you are not familiar with it.
trans-unit.target: Demo products are a good way to learn how to use PrestaShop. You should install them if you are not familiar with it.

trans-unit.source: If you are using PrestaShop for the first time, you should install all modules now and uninstall the ones you don't need later.
trans-unit.target: If you are using PrestaShop for the first time, you should install all modules now and uninstall the ones you don't need later.

trans-unit.source: Configure your database by filling out the following fields
trans-unit.target: Configure your database by filling out the following fields

trans-unit.source: To use PrestaShop, you must create a database to collect all of your store's data-related activities.
trans-unit.target: To use PrestaShop, you must create a database to collect all of your store's data-related activities.

trans-unit.source: Please complete the fields below in order for PrestaShop to connect to your database.
trans-unit.target: Please complete the fields below in order for PrestaShop to connect to your database.

trans-unit.source: The default port is 3306. To use a different port, add the port number at the end of your server's address i.e ":4242".
trans-unit.target: The default port is 3306. To use a different port, add the port number at the end of your server's address i.e ":4242".

trans-unit.source: To install PrestaShop, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.
trans-unit.target: To install PrestaShop, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.

trans-unit.source: To enjoy the many features that are offered for free by PrestaShop, please read the license terms below. PrestaShop core is licensed under OSL 3.0, while the modules and themes are licensed under AFL 3.0.
trans-unit.target: To enjoy the many features that are offered for free by PrestaShop, please read the license terms below. PrestaShop core is licensed under OSL 3.0, while the modules and themes are licensed under AFL 3.0.

trans-unit.source: I agree to the above terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: I agree to the above terms and conditions.

trans-unit.source: Some project modules may submit public and technical information about your store to the PrestaShop Project for analytics purposes. To learn more and make an informed choice, read %link%.
trans-unit.target: Some project modules may submit public and technical information about your store to the PrestaShop Project for analytics purposes. To learn more and make an informed choice, read %link%.

trans-unit.source: You can use the links on the left column to go back to the previous steps, or restart the installation process by clicking here.
trans-unit.target: You can use the links on the left column to go back to the previous steps, or restart the installation process by clicking here.

trans-unit.source: You have just finished installing your shop. Thank you for using PrestaShop!
trans-unit.target: You have just finished installing your shop. Thank you for using PrestaShop!

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, you must delete the "install" folder.
trans-unit.target: For security purposes, you must delete the "install" folder.

trans-unit.source: Manage your store using your Back Office. Manage your orders and customers, add modules, change themes, etc.
trans-unit.target: Manage your store using your Back Office. Manage your orders and customers, add modules, change themes, etc.

trans-unit.source: Discover your store as your future customers will see it!
trans-unit.target: Discover your store as your future customers will see it!

trans-unit.source: We are currently checking PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment
trans-unit.target: We are currently checking PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment has been verified!
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment has been verified!

trans-unit.source: Oops! Please correct the item(s) below, and then click "%refresh_label%" to test the compatibility of your new system.
trans-unit.target: Oops! Please correct the item(s) below, and then click "%refresh_label%" to test the compatibility of your new system.

trans-unit.source:
Warning: You cannot use this tool to upgrade your store anymore.

You already have PrestaShop version %version% installed.

If you want to upgrade to the latest version, please use the 1-Click Upgrade module and follow its instructions.
trans-unit.target:
Warning: You cannot use this tool to upgrade your store anymore.

You already have PrestaShop version %version% installed.

If you want to upgrade to the latest version, please use the 1-Click Upgrade module and follow its instructions.

trans-unit.source: Installing PrestaShop is quick and easy. In just a few moments, you will become part of a community consisting of more than %numMerchants% merchants. You are on the way to creating your own unique online store that you can manage easily every day.
trans-unit.target: Installing PrestaShop is quick and easy. In just a few moments, you will become part of a community consisting of more than %numMerchants% merchants. You are on the way to creating your own unique online store that you can manage easily every day.

trans-unit.source: The language selection above only applies to the Installation Assistant. Once your store is installed, you can choose the language of your store from over %d% translations, all for free!
trans-unit.target: The language selection above only applies to the Installation Assistant. Once your store is installed, you can choose the language of your store from over %d% translations, all for free!

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'mod_auth_basic' Apache module to allow the use of the PrestaShop webservice.
trans-unit.target: Please activate the 'mod_auth_basic' Apache module to allow the use of the PrestaShop webservice.

trans-unit.source: We could not check to see if basic authentication and rewrite extensions have been activated. Please manually check if they've been activated in order to use the PrestaShop webservice.
trans-unit.target: We could not check to see if basic authentication and rewrite extensions have been activated. Please manually check if they've been activated in order to use the PrestaShop webservice.

trans-unit.source: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.
trans-unit.target: Please activate the 'SimpleXML' PHP extension to allow testing of PrestaShop's webservice.

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.
trans-unit.target: It is preferable to use SSL (https:) for webservice calls, as it avoids the "man in the middle" type security issues.
